title: Gillette Venus ComfortGlide Womens Razor Blade Refills, 6 Count,(Pack of 1) White Tea Scented Gel Bar Protects Against Skin Irritation
description: Venus female razor blades are designed with a woman’s body in mind. Venus ComfortGlide White Tea women’s razors have 3 blades for a smooth, close shave. The razor refills come equipped with gel bars that release body butters with a white tea fragrance, for glide and comfort. With a pivoting design that adjusts to your body’s contours. Any Venus blade refill fits any Venus razor handle (except Simply Venus and Venus Pubic Hair Razor).
